function Rating (props){ const {rating, numReviews} = props; return (
= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating>= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'fas fa-star' } /> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating>= 1.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'fas fa-star' } /> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating>= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'fas fa-star' } /> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating>= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'fas fa-star' } /> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating>= 4.5 ? ) } export default Rating;
